annotations.description: This drink is an original developed by myself and Brian Tetorakis for the menu at Cole's French Dip in 2019. The Idea here was to have something light ans re...
annotations.title: The Flamingo Is The Perfect Long Drink To Close Out Summer

textContent:
1oz (30ml) White Rum
1oz (30ml) Rhum Agricole
.75oz (22.5ml) Raspberry Syrup
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
1 Dash Cucumber Bitters
1.5oz (45ml) Tonic Water
Raspberry Garnish

Shake all but tonic, pour into collins glass and top with tonic. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=udeh9E4JU8w
title: Flamingo
